title: MC_CamOut (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK MC_CamOut
This function block disengages the slave axis from the master axis immediately.
Note
It is assumed that this command is followed by another command, as for instance
MC_Stop
,
MC_GearIn
.
If there is no further command following, the default condition should be: maintain last velocity.

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Rising edge: Starts the execution of the function block.

rows: TRUE: Execution of function block has not been finished.
TRUE: Error has occurred within the function block.
